introduction.paragraph: Here's what our community members have to say about Couchbase Mobile.
introduction.quote: It's no exaggeration to say that Couchbase Lite has revolutionised the way I build my data driven apps for both iOS and Android.
SyncGateway is extremely powerful to manage fine-grained access rights and live-synchronisation of data to multiple mobile devices. Developing such a solution ourselves would have been impossible.
